info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 12:29AM CDT until September 06 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN MADISON AND CARROLL COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Grandview to 6 miles north of Forum to 3 miles south of Hindsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Holiday Island... Green Forest... Hindsville... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Forum... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... Marble... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Grandview... Dryfork... Metalton... Connor... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
